svg.text: Europeana Newspapers is the first large-
images and full text directly on the portal.
Up to now, Europeana has only shown
thumbnails of images. Each newspaper pa-
ge aggregated in the project is available for
viewing directly on the Europeana website,
Go and explore these new features on
The sustained use of the Europeana Data
Model in the project means that Europea-
na can now also represent hierarchies be-
tween different objects in their portal.
While there are some good examples of
newspapers available, the design for the
more languages had to be presented in a
web interface that is on the one hand
intuitive and simple to use but on the
other hand provides a broad range of
features such as full text search, search
by collection holder, country, date of
publication or newspaper title. A docu-
content providers in the project wanted
to make their data available (images plus
full-texts, snippets etc.). Based on this,
an early wireframe for the newspaper
and a first prototype was implemented.
After a first round of informal testing
experts were employed to assess the
improvements before a final version would
be released. The results of the study are
improvements to the usability of the
course of 2014, and eventually the final
will be continuously added to the site
Try the newspaper search interface at
European digital historical newspapers available via
svg.title: Europeana Newspapers: Final Report, Page 2
